{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-20T22:41:54.000Z", "description": "Job Title: Senior Software Engineer

Location: Philadelphia, PA or New York, NY

Required Technology And Skills
  • 5 years of software development experience with focus on web-based applications and full-stack development for both customer facing UI and backend services
  • Experience developing software in LAMP stack with PHP preferable utilizing Symfony.
  • Experience developing with a UI framework, Ember.js preferred or React and Anuglar
  • Experience with Linux configuration
  • Some experience with different PHP runtimes
  • Hands on experience with relational databases \u2013 MySQL preferred. Prefer database design and query development
  • Experience maintaining and improving distributed systems
Nice To Have Skills
  • Experience developing a REST API.
  • Knowledge of Docker and containers.
  • Experience working with AWS services
  • Experience with CI/CD preferred Jenkins
Salary And Compensation
  • $120,000-$140,000
  • Bonus
Benefits And Perks
  • Ability to work remote
  • 401K match
Client
  • Our client is a Fortune 500 firm that specialize in software solutions for the edtech and health tech space
